name: Battlezone Gold Edition
description: Strap into the cockpit of the Cobra – the most powerful tank ever built – and experience first-person tank combat across neon-scarred sci-fi landscapes in an explosive campaign for 1-4 players – now playable with or without a VR device!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 processor equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or better
